Kitsuno,

I had some ideas, have some of your friends or yourself with some=
 ties 
in academia announced this to Japanese studies departments in the US=
A, 
UK and AU?  I think some undergrads in teh field would be very grateful=
 
for this opportunity to submit their work.  You may also state very 
clea=
rly (several times) on the site that the work remains the property 
of the =
author etc.  Also universities have cultural centers which are 
interdiscip=
linary and can bring in people from different fields to 
explore samurai hi=
story from different angles...example the science 
of "martial arts".

Have=
 you tried to contact some of the older professors in teh field and 
gotten=
 their take on this project?
